Package com.jummania.converter

Class MoshiConverter

java.lang.Object
com.jummania.converter.MoshiConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataManager.Converter
public class MoshiConverter extends Object implements DataManager.Converter
MoshiConverter is an implementation of the Converter interface that utilizes the Moshi library for converting Java objects to JSON format and vice versa.

This class provides methods to serialize Java objects to JSON strings and to deserialize JSON strings back into Java objects using the Moshi library.

Created by Jummania on 08, December, 2024. Email: sharifuddinjumman@gmail.com Dhaka, Bangladesh.

    • fromReader

      public <T> T fromReader(Reader json, Type typeOfT)
      Converts a JSON stream from a Reader into a Java object of the specified type.
      Specified by:

      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:
